snippet: Ichiro Suzuki signed a one-year contract to remain with the Miami Marlins, giving him an opportunity to reach 3,000 hits in the majors.
abstract: Miami Marlins re-sign outfielder Ichiro Suzuki to one-year contract.
lead_paragraph: Ichiro Suzuki signed a one-year contract to remain with the Miami Marlins, giving him an opportunity to reach 3,000 hits in the majors.

headline.main: Marlins Re-Sign Suzuki for a Year
